document_data.name: ''Tentacle Rod''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''tentacle rod''''' was a [[Magic weapon|magic]] [[rod]] crafted by the [[drow]].
document_data.Description: ''Tentacle rods'' had three rubbery tentacles at one end, which could extend to a length of {{SI|15|ft|long=yes}}.
document_data.Powers: The wielder of a ''tentacle rod'' could attempt to restrain the movement of a creature by wrapping the tentacles around the target. If all three tentacles were successful in the attack, they imposed severe limitations on the victim's movement and ability to act.
document_data.Notable Owners: The drow [[priest]]ess and slaver [[Ilvara Mizzrym]] wielded a ''tentacle rod''.
